name: Space Doubt
description:
Welcome one and all to a  MashUp Game's MiniJam submission. Ever wonder what could happen out in space? 

No? Well this game doesn't really answer that question.

When  your spaceship goes down, it's up to you to decide whether to choose  to trust or doubt your decisions. Who knows, you may have to encounter something a bit... unexpected...

- Try to get one of two endings!

- Survive a strange dream!!

- Maybe even get a cake!!!

This Minijam had the simple theme of Boss Fight, so I tried to make some form of interesting boss. I hope y'all enjoy it at least a lil bit. 

Quick Info: 

1. This be the first game I've ever made! I figured this would be a good opportunity to try something new out! I'd love to hear any feedback!! 

2.  there is a small chance that my submission doesn't count towards the theme as I didn't explicitly say within the game that you are dealing with the final boss. My take on Final Boss was a bit loose, but you still end up having a showdown with  a "powerful entity"

3. Everything but the base structure that comes with a Ren'Py game was made by me!
